title: Financial Conduct Authority Sets End Date for Libor (Audio)
itunes:title: Financial Conduct Authority Sets End Date for Libor (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- John Glover, a Bloomberg News financial reporter, discusses the decision by U.K. regulators to abandon the Libor benchmark, which, in its 50-year history has been linked to several international banking scandals. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
